channel.title: Hamachi not connecting
channel.description:
Ok, my friend is trying to start hamachi and he gets an error message and here it is
Failed to configure hamachi network adapter.
configuration provlem is mostlikely caused by your firewalling software blocking DHCP traddic on hamachi adapter. Please make sure that UDP traffic from local port 68 to port 67 at 5.0.0.1 is allowed. alternateivley you can try completely disable the firewall on hamachi adapter.
if niether of the above helps or you dont understand the message, visit our support forums, ( i think you guys are better ) and report the problem and you will be helped.
would you like blah lbha lbahblha not needed information
i havent posted this on hamachi website yet but i thought you guys would be good since you are smart...
please help.. he has been trying for like a week
